name: resource-info
content:
<paper-material elevation="0">
	<form is="iron-form" id="formResourceInfo" 
		content-type="application/json" 
		method="post" 
		action="/api/{{resourceType}}/{{resourceId}}" 
		on-iron-form-presubmit="onFormResourceInfoPresubmit" 
		on-iron-form-response="onFormResourceInfoResponse">
		
		<paper-input name="name" label="Name" value="{{resource.name}}" autofocus></paper-input>
	    <template is="dom-if" if="{{isPage}}">
			<paper-input name="path" label="Path" value="{{resource.path}}"></paper-input>
		</template>
		<paper-button on-click="save">Save</paper-button>
		<paper-button on-click="delete" class="danger">Delete</paper-button>
	</form>
</paper-material>

<br-list id="importedComponents" 
	collection="components" 
	field="name"
	label="Imported Components" 
	conditions="{{addedComponentsParam(resource.components)}}"
	on-accessory-click="removeComponent"
	accessory-icon="remove-circle-outline"></br-list>
	
<br-list id="availableComponents" 
	collection="components" 
	field="name"
	label="Available Components" 
	conditions="{{availableComponentsParam(resource.components)}}"
	on-accessory-click="addComponent"
	accessory-icon="add-circle-outline"></br-list>
